text: ‘numba janayata avavada karanu. tavada visvasa kalavun vana ovunata ovunge paramadhipati abiyasa sæbævinma sæbæ peramunak æti bava subharamci danvanu’ yæyi niyoga karamin ovun aturin vu miniseku veta api deva panivida danva sitima janaya va puduma karavannak vi da? niyata vasayenma mohu pæhædili huniyamkaruvaku yæyi deva pratiksepakayo pævasuvoya
